title: The role of political parties in national unity

content.question: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically. To what extent did political parties contribute to the development of national unity in the United States between 1790 and 1840 ?

frqParts.text: Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. To what extent did political parties contribute to the development of national unity in the United States between 1790 and 1840 ?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
